solution¶

This module contains the class Solution.

Author:
Yu-Ren Liu, Xiong-Hui Chen
class solution.Solution(x=[], value=nan, resample_value=None, attach=None, post_attach=None, is_in_possible_solution=False)[source]¶
A solution encapsulates a solution vector with attached properties, including dimension information, objective value,

and attachment

__init__(x=[], value=nan, resample_value=None, attach=None, post_attach=None, is_in_possible_solution=False)[source]¶

Initialization.

Parameters:
  • x – a list
  • value – objective value
  • resample_value – reevaluated value
  • attach – attached structure
  • post_attach – the attachment to the solution
  • is_in_possible_solution –
deep_copy()[source]¶

Deep copy this solution. Note that the attachment is not deeply copied.

Returns:a new solution
static deep_copy_set(sol_set)[source]¶

Deep copy a solution set.

Parameters:sol_set – a solution set
Returns:the copied solution set
exist_equal(sol_set)[source]¶

Check if exists another solution in sol_set the same as this one.

Parameters:sol_set – a solution set
Returns:True or False
static find_maximum(sol_set)[source]¶

Find the solution having maximum value from the solution set.

Parameters:sol_set – solution set
Returns:solution, index
static find_minimum(sol_set)[source]¶

Find the solution having minimum value from the solution set.

Parameters:sol_set – solution set
Returns:solution, index
is_equal(sol)[source]¶

Check if two solutions equal.

Parameters:sol – another solution
Returns:True or False
static print_solution_set(sol_set)[source]¶

Print the value of each solution in an solution set.

Parameters:sol_set – solution set
Returns:no return value
